author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

I noticed recently that the code generated with the command:
```bash
 mkdqmedanalyzer -author mmusich Test example_global
```
didn't compile due to the removal of `ConcurrentMonitorElement` and `DQMStore::ConcurrentBooker` in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28092.
This PR changes the skeleton in order to generate code that compiles.

#### PR validation:

Used the command above with this branch and obtained compiling code.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: fix issue with DQMGlobalEDAnalyzer skeleton (mkdqmedanalyzer command)
